Bristol.Zoomerang (Lake Compounce): Lake Compounce is an amusement park located in Bristol and Southington, Connecticut. Opened in 1846, it is the oldest continuously-operating amusement park in the United States. The amusement park covers 332 acres (1.3 km2) of land which includes a beach and a waterpark called Crocodile Cove which can be used by guests for no extra charge.
